appetizers.name: Egg fried rice
appetizers.description: A flavorful dish which borders on being an appetizer

appetizers.name: Potstickers
ingredients: 6 scallions, the white and green parts separated, both minced
4 tablespoons peanut oil or vegetable oil
¼ cup rice vinegar or white vinegar
¾ pound ground pork or other meat
1 egg, lightly beaten in a bowl
appetizers.description: A small Asian dumpling that is stuffed with a variety of ingredients such as meats or fish, vegetables and seasoning.

cold sandwiches.name: Tamago Sando
cold sandwiches.description: Some even argue that it is the best egg sandwich they ever tasted.

cold sandwiches.name: Katsu Sando
cold sandwiches.description: Japanese Katsu Sando is a homey kind of sandwich but downright satisfying

hot sandwiches.name: Banh Mi
hot sandwiches.description: It tastes like a rich ham sandwich with a hit of Asian freshness.

hot sandwiches.name: Korean Street Food Sandwich
hot sandwiches.description: Very popular Korean street food sandwich.

desserts.name: Egg Waffles
desserts.description: Eggs puffs are crispy and the egg puffs themselves are light and fluffy.

desserts.name: Mochi
desserts.description: Chinese New Year's snack; soft, slightly sweet, and chewy, this is a wonderful traditional dessert

drinks.name: Halo Halo
ingredients: sago or tapioca pearls or jelly cut into cubes
ube jam or ube ice cream
drinks.description: A concoction of various sweet treats that are put together to culminate into one great cold treat.

drinks.name: Vietnamese Coffee
ingredients: Cafe Du Monde or Trung Nguyen coffee
drinks.description: Vietnamese coffee is an intensely strong and sweet coffee, have it hot or iced.
